subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] THe Ovilus
author: Marlboro63@aol.com
full_text:
-------------------------------1218562631
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Hi Debbie,
 
The puck is not the same thing as the Ovilus 1.  The puck has to be  attached 
to a computer to be used.  The Ovilus 1 is a handeld device  and needs an 
external speaker.  I found out today that it appeared on  paranormal States but 
this device has been out for a few months now.   Unfortunately I have to sell 
some of my toys so I can purchase a few  more toys that are a bit pricey.  
These are the boss's rules so I have to  abide by them.  I could put it out there 
on Ebay but I wanted to give  someone here a chance to purchase it for the 
price that I paid for it rather  than the price of a new one.
 
Jeff
 
 
In a message dated 8/12/2008 11:36:15 A.M. Central Standard Time,  
debbie.fransen@... writes:

 
 
 
Jeff,
Do you know what the paranormal puck is? Is it the same  thing?
How did you know about this Ovilus 1 before it was on  Paranormal State?
Do- you -know-someone? Or are you involved in the making  of this?
And what NEW TOYS are out there that we don't know  about?
I have alot of questions don't I ? Can't help  it........
You can sell it on ebay...... Why would you want to get  rid of it though, if 
it
works?

 
____________________________________
 From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups EVP-ITC@yahoogroups EVP-ITC@yahoogr EVP-On Behalf 
Of  Marlboro63@...
Sent: Tuesday, August 12, 2008 12:30  PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups EVP
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC]  THe Ovilus




Hi Elabeth,
 
You have to remember much of what the Ovilus 1 said probably ended up on  the 
editing room floor.  But it does work.  I get great responses  from mine.  
The (7) different modes on it work very well.  But if  you know anyone who wants 
one please let me know.  I was informed I  have to sell some of my toys to 
afford to buy new toys...LOLOL  I would  sell it for $165.00 and it is in brand 
new condition and only used a few  times.
 
Jeff
 
 
In a message dated 8/12/2008 11:24:20 A.M. Central Standard Time,  
elabeth@... a messag

 
 
 
I thought it was pretty neat that it repeated the word "worry"  when
Ryan asked if it was worried they'd bring in a priest.
What are  the odds of that just based on environmental readings? If I
had an extra  $200 laying around I'd be buying myself one to play  with.
~Elabeth

On Tue, Aug 12, 2008 at 7:41 AM, Fransen,  Debbie
<_debbie.fransen@..._ (mailto:debbie.fransen@...) >  wrote:
> I don't know how many of the members watch Paranormal State,  but they used
> a new piece of equipment called The Ovilus. You guys  have got to check this
> out. Go to www.digitaldowsing. out. Go to www.digitaldowsing.<WBR>com. I am 
 
> and
> where they came up  with this. To me, it sounds kind of like Frank's Box, 
but
> not the  same.
> Frank, please take a look at this, and tell us what you  think.
> I don't understand how it works......
>  Deb
